Buster.DESCRIPTION: As the first attack card you played,gain damage up buff this turn. NL When playing 3 Buster cards in a row,make an Extra Attack.

Arts.DESCRIPTION: As the first attack card you played,gain NP generation rate up buff this turn. NL When playing 3 times in a row,gains extra NP.

Quick.DESCRIPTION: As the first attack card you played,gain Crit Star generation rate up buff this turn. NL When playing 3 times in a row,gains extra Crit Star.

EX.DESCRIPTION: Special attack card.When NP >= 100,add it to your hand.Cost all NP when playing.Overcharge will more powerful.

HeroCreation.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of this card by 1 energy for each Buster in your hand.

CommandCard.DESCRIPTION: Has a clear color and base damage value, but the damage and hits are determined by the hidden value of the current Spirit Origin.

Shape.DESCRIPTION: Kiyohime currently has two Spirit Origin: #rBerserker and #rLancer .They have different NPCard and hidden value.
